SELECT img_uuid AS imageUuid, img_ext AS imageExt, orgin_name AS orginName, file_name AS fileName, img_url AS imgUrl, img_type AS imageType, img_sort AS imageSort, is_primary AS isPrimary, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM image WHERE ticket_id = #{ticketId} AND img_type = 'TICKET_IMAGE' AND is_primary = 1 ORDER BY img_sort ASC, created_at ASC LIMIT 1
